The several ways of resolving faith in the Roman and Reformed Churches with the authors impartial thoughts upon each of them, and his own opinion at length shewn, wherein the rule of faith doth consist ... Banckes, Matthew.
[23], 197 p.
Printed by Stephen Bulkley, and are to be sold by Richard Lambart ..., York : 1677.
Written by Matthew Banckes. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Errata: p. [22]. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
